extendedInfo.description: Take control over your missed Phone Calls and Text Messages! Send automatic text messages, custom or generic using N4G app to answer your text messages or phone calls when your unavailable. Scenario #1: Running late for a meeting - "Driving"Scenario #2: Meeting with boss - "In a meeting, call you soon"You can also create custom auto text messages for specific people in your contact list.Caution: Program does not work with numbers over 11 digits (i.e. International numbers over 11 digits). Try shortening your number in this case if possible. Created by Shaun DiggsGraphic Design by Bill RixSpecial Thanks to Annette Robinson

reviews.title: Monica
reviews.comment: This app is GREAT and very user friendly. I plan on telling all my friends about it. Works excellent for those who own a business like myself.

reviews.title: M. Jordan
reviews.comment: Cool App!  Beats all the other auto reply programs \"hands down\". I love this app.  Just what I\'ve been wating for.  Thanks QNT!

reviews.title: Valerie T.
reviews.comment: This is an excellent AP. I especially like the (safety) option I\'m driving and the customize feature that allows you to type fun, personal, and, professional replies.
reviews.author: A Google User
